page.title: 19ROADS
page.content: The A19 road is a busy trunk road connecting the Tyne Tunnel with Doncaster, passing near Sunderland, Peterlee, Billingham, Thornaby, Stockton-on-Tees, Middlesbough Thirsk and York. North of Thirsk it is a two lane dual carriageway.To travel along the A174 the trafic on the A19 must go along a slip road,which angles away from the road to the left.The slip road leads to a roundabout where vehicles can change direction safely. this roundabout is constructed between the supports of the bridge holding up the A19.Traffic from the A174 may join the A19 by driving along a slip road and filtering into a safe gap in the traffic already on the road.
